column3: Department of Political Science / School of Public Policy
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe economic, social and political benefits of good governance are high on the agenda of many world organisations. This MSc combines normative and empirical approaches to international justice, organisations and processes, and applies them to the analysis of global political institutions and policies.Students of this MSc will benefit from research preparation and tailor-made interdisciplinary and multidisciplinary training of the highest quality at one of the world's best universities.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
